name: .YAODL File Extension
summary: Learn about .YAODL files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: 3D model used by PowerFlip, a program used to view and spin 3D objects; may contain polygons, NURBS, quad-meshes, object parameters, textures, and colors for objects, facets, and vertexes.

content: YAODL stands for "Yet Another Object Description Language." The format was originally used to store 3D models for PowerFlip demonstrations. It was not widely adopted and is no longer used by Silicon Graphics (SGI).

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
